file_content.text: You have removed those who are not of the nest. Had they stayed, they would have learned the peace of the Joining.
We will not deny you your prize.
But leave now. There has been a Song of Swarming. We have claimed these mines for the nest.
I'm looking for Stanel Thul's daughter.
Are you Daria Thul?
"We"? You're no bug.
I'll decide when I'm done here.
Don't give me orders.
A human attitude. In the nest, no one needs to fight to defend a reputation or pride.
Once, we were called Daria Thul. Now, we are known as New-Child of the Ukanaku nest.
We have tasted the gel and scented the egg chamber. We have Joined.
So you're a Killik now?
Joined?
I'm here to rescue you.
You are mistaken. We are not here against our will. We have joined the Kind.
There is peace in the nest, a love that comes of sharing one mind. It is a gift beyond measure.
I don't care about some bug cult, I'm here for the reward.
Quit preaching.
We are of the nest now. You cannot take us from it any more than your lungs could live outside your body.
There is no war among the Kind, no hate, no confusion. We are one and we are at peace.
We will never return.
How can you live like this?
You don't belong here.
How do you live in a world where everyone is a stranger, where a smile may conceal a knife in the back?
You would leave your friends, your father?
This is really what you want?
Stanel Thul is not my family. He and his kind have brought war to Alderaan in the name of their own power.
Shut up and come with me.
Here, we are safe. Here, we are at peace. Here we will stay.
Come with me, or die along with every Killik here. That's your only option.
Come with me or else.
No, we will never--
We are hearing the voice of the nest. We have decided it is not worth many losses to save one.
The nest has spoken. We will return.
If you have found happiness, however unlikely, I will not take that from you.
I respect your choice.
Thank you.
If you ever tire of the world of violence and mistrust, return. The peace of the nest is open to all.
The peace of the nest is for everyone.
Thank you. Perhaps we will scent you again.
If they would accept it, every man and woman on Alderaan could feel the peace of the nest.
